title: Lido Restaurant and Bayside Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Juice bar, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A bayside restaurant with an art deco hipster feel and waterfront seating, located in the Standard Hotel. Offers vegan, vegetarian, and raw food dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Vegan desserts include a popular vegan ding dong. Free Wi-Fi. Valet parking only.
